analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Ahamasmi, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇo yācayogo sadā payatapāṇi antimadehadharo anuttaro bhisakko sallakatto.
analyzed: aham asmi bhikkhave brāhmaṇaḥ yāca yogaḥ sadā payata pāṇi antima deha dharaḥ anuttaraḥ bhisakkaḥ sallakatto

original: Tassa me tumhe puttā orasā mukhato jātā dhammajā dhammanimmitā dhammadāyādā, no āmisadāyādā.
analyzed: tassa me tumhe puttāḥ orasāḥ mukhataḥ jātāḥ dhamma jāḥ dhamma nimmitāḥ dhamma dāyādāḥ no āmisa dāyādā

original: Etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ dvinnaṁ dānānaṁ yadidaṁ dhammadānaṁ.
analyzed: etat agga bhikkhave imesam dvinnam dānānam yat idam dhamma dāna
āmisa savibhāgo ca dhamma savibhāgo ca

original: Etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ dvinnaṁ saṁvibhāgānaṁ yadidaṁ dhammasaṁvibhāgo.
analyzed: etat agga bhikkhave imesam dvinnam savibhāgānam yat idam dhamma savibhāgaḥ
āmisa anuggahaḥ ca dhamma anuggahaḥ ca

original: Etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ dvinnaṁ anuggahānaṁ yadidaṁ dhammānuggaho.
analyzed: etat agga bhikkhave imesam dvinnam anuggahānam yat idam dhamma anuggahaḥ
āmisa yāgo ca dhamma yāgo ca

original: Etadaggaṁ, bhikkhave, imesaṁ dvinnaṁ yāgānaṁ yadidaṁ dhammayāgo”ti.
analyzed: etat agga bhikkhave imesam dvinnam yāgānam yat idam dhamma yāgaḥ ti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
